pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cyclone-------|PyPI version||PyPI - Wheel|Cyclone is a CGRA router as part of PnR system.Requirement------------ CMake 3.9+- g++-7/clang-6 or aboveInstall-------To install from source, simply do:: mkdir build cd build cmake .. && make -jCyclone also has a complete Python binding available, to use the Pythonbinding, simply do:: pip install pycycloneYou can see the example code in ``example`` folder... |PyPI version| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/pycyclone.svg :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/pycyclone.. |PyPI - Wheel| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/wheel/pycyclone.svg
